text: Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Yes, I am a fairy and I will grant you three wishes." I say "I wish to be the most beautiful woman in the world." The fairy says "Your wish is granted." I look at the mirror and can't believe what I see! I see a very charming and beautiful woman in the mirror. "Is it me?" I asked the fairy. The fairy said it is. I say "I wish to be rich." The fairy says "Your wish is granted." I check my bank balance online which shows $10 millions! I am greedy and say "I wish to have a big house."
